description: Azuma Rin, is capable of manipulating the four great magical elements of fire, wind, earth and water making her an extremely rare Quad Magician. She excels in utilizing the knowledge learned in school to enhance her magic as well as casting mixed spells using multiple elements. She teams up with http://anidb.net/ch101272 [Taichi] and becomes an adventurer, though she is often embarrassed by his speech and conduct.
name: Azuma Rin
